name: Apache Web Server
check_cmd: if command -v systemctl >/dev/null; then if systemctl is-active apache2 >/dev/null 2>&1; then echo ok; else echo fix; fi; elif command -v service >/dev/null; then if service apache2 status 2>/dev/null | grep -q running; then echo ok; else echo fix; fi; else echo ok; fi
fix_cmd: if command -v systemctl >/dev/null; then systemctl restart apache2 || true; elif command -v service >/dev/null; then service apache2 restart || true; fi
verify_cmd: if systemctl is-active apache2 >/dev/null 2>&1; then echo ok; else echo fail; fi
